ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
base = source.getKey();
lis = java.getElements('.chapters.0@li@a');
var list = [];

for (var i = 0; i < lis.length; i++) {
     var href = lis[i].attr('href');
     var text = lis[i].text();
     if (/javascript/.test(href)) {
        if ( i < lis.length - 1 ) {
            var url = "https://www.baidu.com" + lis[i + 1].attr('href');         
        } else {
            var url = "https://cn.bing.com" + lis[i - 1].attr('href');
        }
     } else { var url = base + href; }
     //java.log(lis[i].text()+":"+url);
     list.push({"text": text, "href": url});
}

list
</js>
